name: Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Control Checklist - Digging / Excavating (incl. marking out & potholing existing services). Notify Worksafe NZ if required.
• Ensure all necessary Permit to Works & Controlled Checklists are in place
Records - Permit attached or permit number noted
Detail - Ensure TMP is approved and check that the requirements are correctly interpreted and understood by the STMS
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - TMP is approved by AT for the site and works are completed within the approved dates
Records - TMP on MyWorksites/ On Site
Detail - Ensure that Sub-Contract and Supplier Agreements are signed and that personnel have gone through the NWBI induction.
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Signed subcontract & Supplier agreements. Issued induction stickers and number
Records - Signed Agreements, Updated Induction Register
Detail - Ensure that Design is approved and Drawings are of the latest revision
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - IFC label on drawings
Detail - Set out pegs installed every 10m of the footpath showing the FL.
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Survey
Detail - Bedding, Haunching and Backfill Material
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - AS/NZS 3725, AS/NZS 3500.3
Conformance Criteria - Crushing Resistance not less than 100kN. Maximum percentage of weight passing 0.075mm sieve shall not exceed 10%
Detail - Confirm pipes diameter, class & jointing type as shown on the drawings, and that the pipes are correct and in good condition.
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Pipe - Diameter & Class, Manholes, Catchpits as per SW CoP and AS/NZS 3725
Detail - Inspect trench profile and ensure it is correct to lines and levels to design
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Visual/Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Line and level is correct
Detail - Ensure trench width is sufficient as per AS/NZS 3725 namely 3x Diameter of Pipe
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Visual Inspection
Detail - As per specification, Shear Vane <50 KPa 2%<CBR<3% Undercut 150mm, CBR<2% Seek Design Engineer's advice
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Testing
Conformance Criteria - Shear Vane >50 Kpa, CBR > 3%
Detail - Undercut If subgrade fails testing requirements and replace with copmpacted GAP40 for depth of undercut
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Testing
• Pipe Diameter<300mm bedding, side and haunch zones to be 100mm
• Pipe Diameter >300mm bedding, side and Haunch zones to be 150mm
• Stucture Bedding to comprise of a 75-100mm levelling course GAP20
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Testing
Conformance Criteria - As per AS/NZS 3725 Minimum Bedding, Side and Haunch Zone CIV > 15
Detail - Backfill zone compacted in GAP40 layers no greater than 200mm  .
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Compliance with requirements from Specifications and SW CoP.
Detail - Inspect pipes prior to backfilling to ensure they have been installed correctly and the joints are in place and sealed.
• Ensure Pipes do not exceed ±25 mm from design levels for any five metres of pipe
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Visual/Inspection
Conformance Criteria - No defects/ gaps / pipes are aligned correctly. Compliance with the Stormwater Contract specification
Detail - As-built survey of pipes installed
Frequency - Once line is completed between 2 structures
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Survey
Detail - Ensure correct thickness of compacted overlay zone - 150mm overlay above top of pipe for Pipe Diameter between 300 and 1500mm
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Compliance with the drawings . 150mm overlay above top of pipe.  Refer to AS/NZS 3725

Detail - Backfill zone compacted in GAP40  layers no greater than 200mm  . Requirements based on pipe location. Minimum cover 1200mm from top of pipe in carraigeway and 800mm in berm. If Cover cannot be achieveded seek advice from design engineer
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Document Review & Testing
Conformance Criteria - Compliance with requirements from Specifications and SW CoP.
Records - Checksheet, Lab Report, QA Sheets
Detail - Galvanised Step irons required in chambers over 1500mm deep
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Visual/Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Maximum 600mm from manhole frame to first rung. Maximum 300mm between rungs. As Per ATCoP
Detail - Structures to be installed to the design survey location and level
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Visual/Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Survey markouts for centre of structure and insatllment to be from centre of structure
Detail - All joints are to be sealed including rungs and lids
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Visual/Inspection
Conformance Criteria - 25 MPa concrete to be used for throat haunching and cradle around inlets an outlets
Detail - Adjustment rings to ensure correct level and fall to cover
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Visual/Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Maximum throat depth on manholes to be 450mm. Miminimum riser usage is required and minimum riser height to be 300mm. All Joints between risers must be epoxied
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Visual/Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Benching at base of Manhole shall be formed with 25 Mpa concrete.
Detail - Manhole covers & frames set to correct level
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Visual/Inspection/ Check
Conformance Criteria - Heavy Duty Class E manhole covers required in trafficable areas as per AS 3996 400 KN rating
Records - Checksheet, Delivery Dockets, SW CoP
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Measurement
Conformance Criteria - Minimum sump depth to 450mm as per AT CoP
Detail - Catchpit grate levels are set to correct level
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Visual/Inspection/ Check
Conformance Criteria - Measure on site and must be Cycle friendly Class D lids as per AS/ 3996 rating 210 KN
Records - Checksheet, Delivery Dockets, SW CoP
Detail - CCTV record at completion of trench backfill and prior to final surfacing
Frequency - At completion of the works
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Visual Inspection/ CCTV inspection
Detail - Red pen mark up drawings to be included in QA file
Frequency - At the completion of the Lot of work
Inspection / Test Method (Submission, Visual Inspection, Testing, Measurement, Review) - Drawings
